Race.SpecificTitle: Chief of Police -- Town of Jena
Chief of Police -- Town of Olla
Chief of Police -- Town of Tullos
PW Police Jury -- 1 mill - PJ - 10 year
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Millage)
(Council on Aging)

Summary:  10 year, 1 mill property tax for providing funds to the LaSalle Council on Aging to match Federal and State funds allocated to LaSalle Parish for services to the elderly, including the establishment and maintenance of centers for senior citizens.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a special tax of one (1) mill on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $62,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019, for the purpose of providing funds to the LaSalle Council on Aging to match Federal and State funds allocated to LaSalle Parish for services to the elderly, including the establishment and maintenance of centers for senior citizens?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. No. 3 -- 5.33 Mills - PJ - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 3 Proposition
(Millage Continuation)

Summary:  5 years, 5.33 mills property tax continuation for Road District No. 3 for road and bridge construction and maintenance for the District, title to which shall be in the public.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 3, LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a five and thirty-three hundredths (5.33) mills tax on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $32,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of road and bridge construction and maintenance for the District, title to which shall be in the public?

Race.SpecificTitle: Hospital Ser. Dist. No. 2 -- 5 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Hospital Service District No. 2 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 5 mills tax renewal for Hospital Service District No. 2 for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating the hospital buildings and facilities, including equipment, in and for the District.
Race.FullText: Shall Hospital Service District No. 2 of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a tax of five (5) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $218,320 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating the hospital buildings and facilities, including equipment, in and for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Rogers Nebo Fire District -- 5 mills - BOC - 10 years
Race.SummaryText:
Rogers Nebo Fire District Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 5 mills tax renewal for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating facilities and equipment to provide fire protection and emergency medical services, including paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes.
Race.FullText: Shall Rogers Nebo Fire District of LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of five (5) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $38,450 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating facilities and equipment to provide fire protection and emergency medical services, including paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
